title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator Gameplay - FARMERS REBELLION
description:
Totally Accurate Battle Simulator Gameplay - This is my first look at this wonderful game created by Landfall.  In this video I spend about 25mins trying to beat as many levels as possible.  The game is still in pre-alpha. Enjoy the video :D 

Sign up for Alpha: http://landfall.se/totally-accurate-battle-simulator

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
